column4: hello. what is the name of the bubble help that pops up if I receive new e-mails, connect to a new wifi, receive twitter news ...?
do you know by chance if I can change the settings to shorten the time it displays messages?
don't want to disable it but it's somewhat annoying if it shows up too long
i believe there was a tool to customize it, if u google a bit on that
thanks anyway, will google for that
